name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior Full Stack Developer with over 10 years of experience specializing in **React.js**, **Node.js**, and **Microservices architecture**. Proven track record in developing robust database solutions with **SQL** and **MongoDB**, ensuring high performance in healthcare and finance sectors. Expert in building cloud-native applications leveraging industry-leading technologies, doing so on major platforms like **Azure** and **AWS**. Adept at architecting full-stack applications and implementing secure, scalable systems, with a strong focus on compliance standards including HIPAA and PCI DSS.

Equipped with a deep understanding of database architecture and a solid grasp of CI/CD practices to streamline development processes. Excellent command of English, enabling effective communication and collaboration across teams. Committed to creating high-quality software solutions that positively impact user experiences and drive organizational success.

experience.responsibilities:
• Designed and implemented scalable full-stack solutions utilizing **React.js** and **Node.js**, adhering to modern development standards.
• Led the transition from monolithic applications to **microservices architecture**, leveraging **Docker** and **Kubernetes** (AKS/EKS) to enhance application performance and reliability.
• Developed and optimized **SQL** and **MongoDB** database architectures to support large-scale applications, processing over **1 million** records efficiently.
• Ensured high coding standards through comprehensive testing strategies using Jest, PyTest, and Postman, achieving over **95%** code coverage on critical components.
• Collaborated effectively within cross-functional teams, communicating complex technical concepts fluently in **Intermediate-advanced English**, enabling clear project discussions and timely decision-making.
• Architected cloud-native data solutions, integrating database management systems, facilitating seamless data processing and retrieval, and improving application response times by **30%**.
• Facilitated code reviews and mentorship sessions, helping bridge knowledge gaps among team members, contributing to a **20%** increase in team productivity.

• Developed dynamic, user-focused front-end applications using **React (18)**, applying modern libraries and frameworks to enhance UI performance and responsiveness.
• Led the implementation of a **microservices architecture** using **Node.js** (NestJS/Express) to increase scalability and maintainability of financial platforms, resulting in a **30%** boost in throughput for high-volume transaction systems.
• Enhanced database architecture by utilizing **SQL** and **MongoDB**, ensuring efficient data storage and retrieval for diverse financial applications.
• Built and integrated real-time dashboards using **D3.js** and **Power BI Embedded**, enabling teams to monitor transactions and analyze financial data with greater accuracy and speed.
• Established a robust event-driven architecture by integrating **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus**, facilitating better asynchronous communication that improved transaction processing efficiency by **25%**.
• Designed and orchestrated ETL pipelines with **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Data Factory**, achieving real-time ingestion of financial data and leveraging internal and third-party sources.
• Implemented advanced AI/ML algorithms for fraud detection using **scikit-learn** and **XGBoost**, improving risk assessment accuracy by **40%** through enhanced pattern analysis and anomaly detection.
• Created and managed ML pipelines for credit scoring and transaction classification using **MLflow** and **Airflow**, streamlining real-time decision-making processes for financial operations.

Utilized **React.js** and **Node.js** to design and develop robust microservices architecture that supports a global e-commerce platform, ensuring high availability and scalability across various applications.
Engineered high-performance backend services using **Python** and **FastAPI**, delivering low latency solutions for core functionalities such as checkout and order fulfillment across **9** key modules.
Developed and maintained **SQL** databases, including **MongoDB** and **PostgreSQL**, enhancing the database architecture for improved data integrity and accessibility, capable of handling **10K** concurrent transactions.
Optimized the user experience on web and mobile platforms by developing responsive UI components in **React.js** (version **18**) and **Vue 3**, leveraging **TypeScript** and **Tailwind CSS** to ensure rapid load times and user engagement.
Implemented caching strategies utilizing **Redis** for shopping cart sessions and search results, leading to a **50%** reduction in database read pressure and a significant boost in application responsiveness.
Designed an event-driven architecture with **Kafka** and **RabbitMQ** to power real-time features, facilitating dynamic inventory tracking and live order updates, thus enhancing customer interaction.
Created secure and efficient payment processing workflows with **Stripe**, **PayPal**, and **Razorpay**, focusing on PCI-compliance and tokenized transactions to safeguard sensitive customer data.
Leveraged advanced data techniques with **AI/ML** tools including **scikit-learn** and **TensorFlow** to personalize user experiences that improved conversion rates by **30%** from real-time behavioral data insights.
Implemented role-based access control (RBAC) and **OAuth 2.0**, ensuring secure and compliant access management, which meets GDPR standards while enhancing platform security during updates.
Established best practices for deployment pipelines using **Kubernetes** for managing blue-green deployments, contributing to smooth rollouts and A/B testing for new features.
